initial_dialog.name: Witch
initial_dialog.text: lol I own u now bitch.

initial_dialog.name: Witch
initial_dialog.text: I made your head a pumpkin so you don't try to run away.

initial_dialog.name: Witch
initial_dialog.text: Isn't that great? You smile all the time.

initial_dialog.name: Witch
initial_dialog.text: Bring me ingredients for my potions or I'll kidnap your family too.

initial_dialog.name: Witch
initial_dialog.text: Talk to me to learn what I need next.

initial_dialog.name: Witch
initial_dialog.text: Oh and be nice to my familiar, Fluffcat.

ingredients.name: Witch
ingredients.text: idk fuckin souls of the damned or some shit.
